derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: variant of controller, by erroneous association with French compte 'calculation' or its source, late Latin computus

entry.tran: 审计员，审计官(主要用于官员的头衔中)
entry.def: A comptroller is someone who is in charge of the accounts of a business or a government department; used mainly in official titles.
